Name: TruthGundlach
Text: Fed: “two ‘19 hikes & Auto QT” in mere weeks turned into “patient & maybe QE regular tool”. Now it’s “past <2% CPI needs future >2% offset”.

Name: TruthGundlach
Text:
So Fed is saying they not only will allow, but
actually desire CPI to rise above 2%!  Bond market is getting boiled like a frog in a pot.

Name: TruthGundlach
Text: Achieving more of the SocGen definition of “success” hapless Oudea announced today he is weighing cutting 1000’s of investment banking jobs.

Name: TruthGundlach
Text: Goal of 2% not just future inflation, but for the future to make up for past “shortfalls” means the real Fed goal is prices 2x every 35 yrs.
